snippet: The Hyundai Motor Company, the automaking subsidiary of Hyundai, the South Korean conglomerate, has ended its business dealings with Iran, where it had extensive operations.
abstract: Hyundai Motor Company quietly ends its business dealings with Iran, where it had extensive operations; move is in response to a strict new American law putting pressure on foreign companies to reduce or eliminate their operations in Iran.
lead_paragraph: The Hyundai Motor Company, the automaking subsidiary of Hyundai, the South Korean conglomerate, has ended its business dealings with Iran, where it had extensive operations.
